thread.title: EastEnders lines up a death for Lee Carter as he leaves goodbye note? | Metro News
thread.title_full: EastEnders lines up a death for Lee Carter as he leaves goodbye note? | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: EastEnders lines up a death for Lee Carter as he leaves goodbye note? | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 14 Feb 2017 7:55 pm (Picture: BBC) 
So has Lee Carter left EastEnders for good – or is there more to the story? 
Whitney was left shocked when she was left at her Valentine’s meal by her husband and eventually returned home to find the flat cleared of Lee’s belonging and a note left. Whitney, who has stood by Lee throughout his recent difficult months, couldn’t believe her eyes when she read the note which said Lee doesn’t love her anymore. He had also left his wedding ring in the envelope before leaving. 
His decision came after Mick advised him to walk away as Whitney deserves better. Later, Lee had a heart to heart with Patrick Trueman at the allotments and Patrick gave him food for thought when he suggested that sometimes you have to start over to fix things. (Picture: BBC) 
At the meal, Lee tried his hardest but the atmosphere was fraught, especially as they were surrounded by happier couples. As Whitney assured Lee that everything would be okay, even when they faced their next tough times, he realised that he didn’t want his wife to just be constantly weighed down by heartache. (Picture: BBC) 
Making out he needed to get something, Lee walked away and offered a lingering look to the wife he was leaving behind, something which proved that the note he left wasn’t true. 
As Whitney is left devastated by Lee’s departure, have we now seen the last of Lee as Danny-Boy Hatchard departs the show? (Picture: BBC) 
Or might the story still have some way to go? 
Some fans will inevitably be worried that the note might actually be a suicide note as Lee previously contemplated jumping to his death as things got on top of him after Christmas. Are EastEnders lining up a tragic ending that will leave Whitney and the Carters even more distraught? 
We reckon that after Patrick warned Mick about the weight of the world being on Lee’s shoulders that he might have second thoughts about Lee going off into the unknown alone. (Picture: BBC) 
Can Lee be tracked down? And will he be persuaded to come home? 
Or has Whitney seen the last of her husband and destined to think that he fell out of love with her? 
EastEnders continues on Thursday 16th February at 7:30pm on BBC One.
